input_text:
Job Title: Underwriter- KBK

Location: Harahan, LA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
KBK Insurance Group is the premier insurance provider for the commercial towing and garage industry and has been the partner of choice for agents for more than 30 years. The company is a one-stop-shop for comprehensive and cost-effective coverage and is backed by an A+ rated carrier. We take pride in being recognized as the most trusted and experienced towing and garage specialists in our industry, known for our personal service and tight-knit relationships.

KBK is part of NSM Insurance Group, a global specialty insurance provider with more than $1.6 billion in premium across 25+ specialty insurance programs and brands around the world. Named a Philadelphia Inquirer Top Workplace based on employee feedback, the company has been exclusively focused on building successful insurance programs since 1990 and continually seeks new opportunities to grow and expand through strategic mergers and acquisitions.

Relationships are paramount at NSM because we know that’s what drives mutual, long-term success. We maintain an entrepreneurial spirit and startup mindset within an established organization that continues to redefine what specialty insurance means and how it impacts everyday lives. Employees are given endless opportunities to expand their interests and skillsets, push breakthrough ideas and take risks. Our open, supportive environment gives employees the confidence to take ownership of their work as if the business was their own.

At NSM, we Build Success every day for our people, carrier partners, agents and insureds — because we know our success is built on yours.

The Underwriter will be responsible for daily contact with agents within the P&C marketplace discussing risk, negotiating on pricing, coverage, and acceptability while providing and/or requesting information. This position will communicate with the marketing team about inquiries concerning service, risk evaluation, questions on procedures, rates, premium evaluation, and service.

Hybrid schedule, 2-3 days onsite. Office located in Dallas, TX & New Orleans, LA.** 

Responsibilities

 Generate, underwrite, and analyze accounts.  Risk selection by qualifying leads and identifying target market.  Communicate with brokers for new and renewal business.  Price and issue multiple quotes with selected markets.  Develop and maintain strong broker relationships, including visitation.  Thorough documentation of underwriting file.  Monitor claim activity and reporting.  Work closely with leaders in negotiation and handling of larger accounts.  Prepare thorough and succinct referral(s) to supervisor or company.  Perform other duties as assigned/required . 

Qualifications

 3-5 years of commercial property & casualty underwriting experience with specific expertise in towing, garage, and used car dealership programs.  Multi-line P&C background to include Commercial Auto, Garage Keepers Liability, Dealers Open Lot, Commercial General Liability and Commercial Property, preferred.  Ability to develop and foster carrier and broker relationships.  Strong written and verbal communication skills.  Aptitude to negotiate, influence and close deals.  Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.  Excellent organizational and time management skills.  Bachelor’s degree, preferred.  Open to travel as necessary, less than 20% per year.  P&C license required, or to be obtained within the first 90 days of employment.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Underwriter- KBK
output_json.summary: KBK Insurance Group is the premier insurance provider for the commercial towing and garage industry.
job_responsibilities: Risk selection by qualifying leads and identifying target market.
Communicate with brokers for new and renewal business.
Price and issue multiple quotes with selected markets.
Develop and maintain strong broker relationships, including visitation.
Work closely with leaders in negotiation and handling of larger accounts.
Prepare thorough and succinct referral(s) to supervisor or company.
output_json.company_information: KBK Insurance Group is the premier insurance provider for the commercial towing and garage industry.
